column4: Netflix suffers Christmas Eve outage  points to Amazon
column5: NEW YORK An outage at one of Amazon's web service centers hit users of Netflix Inc.'s streaming video service on Christmas Eve and was not fully resolved until Christmas day  a spokesman for the movie rental company said on Tuesday.

column4: Mitsubishi Chem: will buy capsule maker from Carlyle for $660 mln
column5: TOKYO  Dec 25 Japan's Mitsubishi Chemical Holdings Corp said it will acquire drug capsule maker Qualicaps Co Ltd from U.S.-based Carlyle Group LP for 55.8 billion yen ($660 million) to beef up its pharmaceutical operations.

column4: Mitsubishi Chem: will buy capsule maker from Carlyle for $660 mln
column5: TOKYO  Dec 25 Japan's Mitsubishi Chemical Holdings Corp said it will acquire drug capsule maker Qualicaps Co Ltd from U.S.-based Carlyle Group LP for 55.8 billion yen ($660 million) to beef up its pharmaceutical operations.

column4: Tycoons to largely reinvest TNK-BP cash in Russia
column5: MOSCOW Soviet-born tycoons selling out of TNK-BP  will largely reinvest the proceeds from Russia's biggest takeover deal back into the country  the AAR consortium said on Tuesday  following President Vladimir Putin's call on them to do so.

column4: Sinopec to research China shale gas development with ConocoPhillips
column5: BEIJING  Dec 25 China's Sinopec Group and ConocoPhillips will research potentially vast reserves of shale gas in southwestern China over the next two years  state news agency Xinhua reported on Tuesday.

column4: Japan approves Novo's new combination insulin Ryzodeg
column5: COPENHAGEN Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk said on Tuesday Japan's health regulator had approved its new combination insulin  that it plans to market as Ryzodeg  for the treatment of diabetes.

column4: Japan approves Novo's new combination insulin Ryzodeg
column5: COPENHAGEN  Dec 25 Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk  said on Tuesday Japan's  health regulator had approved its new combination insulin  that it plans to market as Ryzodeg  for the treatment of diabetes.

column4: Jessica Simpson's Christmas tweet seems to confirm pregnancy rumor
column5: U.S. actress  singer and fashion designer Jessica Simpson sent a Christmas Twitter message that apparently confirms media rumors that she is pregnant - showing a photo of her daughter Maxwell with the words "Big Sis" spelled out in sand.

column4: UPDATE 1-Sony says China business has recovered  foresees growth
column5: * Sony emerging markets business to grow 40 pct by FY 2014   (Adds comment)

column4: Sony says China business back at pre-dispute level
column5: BEIJING  Dec 25 Sony Corp's business in China has "more or less" returned to levels seen before recent protests over Japan's actions over a group of disputed islands  the Japanese company's China chief  Nobuki Kurita  told reporters on Tuesday.
